prompt:
Explain the process of how a plant cell would respond if there were a deficiency in magnesium ion supply.
I am conducting an experiment to study the effect of different ion concentrations on plant cells, particularly the effect of magnesium ions. I have prepared a solution containing varying levels of magnesium ion concentration and will be introducing it into a group of identical plant cells. The plant cells are from the same lineage and share the same genome. Their only difference is their exposure to different concentrations of magnesium ions.
